content: Here, you can view the detailed storage usage data in this {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a general description of storage usage data in the product. It appears on a page within the Portal Settings categories and is rendered as a text label next to an icon indicating availability. The product name is used for contextualization.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The variable '{{productName}}' is placed correctly in the translated sentence.
The word 'prostoru' (space) doesn't quite capture the meaning of 'in this {{productName}}'. It implies a defined space, whereas the English suggests a specific instance or product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zde si můžete zobrazit podrobné údaje o využití úložiště v tomto {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'αποθ. χώρου' (apoth. chorou) is a shortened form of 'αποθηκευτικού χώρου' (apothikeutikou chorou), which translates to 'storage space'. While understandable, the full form is more formal and preferred in technical documentation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Εδώ, μπορείτε να δείτε τα λεπτομερή δεδομένα χρήσης του αποθηκευτικού χώρου σε αυτό το {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "view the detailed storage usage data" is better translated as something more natural in French. 'Consulter' is correct but 'l'utilisation de l'espace de stockage' could be improved for clarity and flow. A more natural translation might be something along the lines of 'consulter les détails de l'utilisation de l'espace de stockage'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: consulter les détails de l'utilisation de l'espace de stockage

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) after 'տվյալները' which might not be the standard formatting for this type of descriptive text.  A period (.) would be more common.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այստեղ դուք կարող եք դիտել պահեստավորման օգտագործման մանրամասն տվյալները այս {{productName}}-ում։

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ආචයන' (aachayana) is not the correct translation for 'storage usage'. It generally refers to rites or ceremonies. A more accurate translation for 'storage usage' would be 'ගබඩා භාවිතය' (gabada vaipaya) or 'භණ්ඩාගාර භාවිතය' (bhandaaragara vaipaya).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ආචයන භාවිතය' with 'ගබඩා භාවිතය' or 'භණ්ඩාගාර භාවිතය'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure could be improved for better flow and naturalness in Sinhala.  While grammatically understandable, it feels a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the sentence to something like: 'මෙතැනදී ඔබට මෙම {{productName}} හි ගබඩා භාවිතය පිළිබඳව වඩාත් සවිස්තරාත්මක තොරතුරු දැකීමට හැකිය.' (Methandee obaa nimatha {{productName}} hi gabada vaipaya pelives vadaatha savistharaatmakatha thorathuru dekimita hathiya.)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Slovak translation uses 'priestore' which translates to 'space' or 'area' and doesn't accurately convey 'this {{productName}}'. It's likely the intention was to say 'v tomto produkte' (in this product) or 'v tejto aplikácii' (in this application), depending on the context of productName.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tu si môžete pozrieť podrobné údaje o využití úložiska v tomto produkte {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'prostoru' (space) doesn't accurately reflect the meaning of 'Here, you can view the detailed storage usage data in this {{productName}}'. It implies a physical space rather than the product itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tukaj si lahko ogledate podrobne podatke o uporabi prostora za shranjevanje v tem izdelku {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the use of '{{productName}}' is consistent with the English, consider if it's the preferred method for placeholders in the Slovene context. It might be more natural to use a different placeholder system.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider reviewing the product’s terminology guidelines for preferred placeholder style in Slovenian. For example, it may be more natural to use a variable name like 'izdelekIme' instead of '{{productName}}'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes an extra hyphen after 'productName'. This is grammatically incorrect in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the hyphen after 'productName'. The correct translation would be: 'Овде можете видети детаљне податке о коришћењу складишта у овом {{productName}}.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'productName'-u' is unnecessary and makes the sentence slightly awkward. The 'u' should be directly adjacent to the variable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ovde možete videti detaljne podatke o korišćenju skladišta u ovom {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'просторі' (prostori) which translates to 'space' doesn't quite fit the context. 'Сховище' refers to storage, and a better translation would imply the storage location or environment, not just a space.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тут ви можете переглянути докладні дані про використання сховища в цьому {{productName}}.
